title: Workshop on Needs Analysis and Blended Learning Environment Design for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory, comprehension of science subjects, and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Capacity-building program for pre-service and in-service teachers to design blended online-VR learning environments for science education

learning_goals: Design an online learning environment that motivates adult learners by applying ERG Theory (Existence, Relatedness, Growth).
Develop at least one customized learning scenario integrating science curricula using simulation/VR tools.
Evaluates the ability to systematically analyze learner needs through a portfolio and feedback system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
